name: WastelandElysium
description: Wasteland Elysium is a post-apocalyptic action shooter with rich Rogue-like elements built in. High school girl Rowling and her mysterious traveling companions landed on a territory devoid of living creatures, they will face countless hordes of mutated creatures, one crazy attack after another! Faint signals, occasional warheads and medkits scattered everywhere, it seems that someone is secretly helping you in this time of survival; Act quick! Collect resources as soon as possible, get more power to repel this group of monsters, unlock more skills and survive long enough! Trust that someone will save you at the end of time......
